a.n: Une Soir√©e de Poche: Nils Frahm

p.k: In this episode, the Berlin musician and composer Nils Frahm showcases his incredible piano dexterity. Frahm is known for his minimalist and experimental works in which he combines neoclassical elements and electronic music.
p.d: In this episode, the Berlin musician and composer Nils Frahm showcases his incredible piano dexterity. Frahm is known for his minimalist and experimental works in which he combines neoclassical elements and electronic music. This show gives pride of place to musical improvisation, and to various instruments and experimental objects.
